nodes.text: Chandra was the larger of the two moons of the Core World of Chandrila, which was located in the Chandrila system of the Bormea sector. The lifeless terrestrial moon was covered in massive craters caused by asteroid impacts and had a thin atmosphere, which caused its barren surface to reflect a lavender-colored light. Chandra's name meant "point" in the Chandrilan language, and the moon loomed impossibly large over the planet.

The fact that Chandrila had two moons was established by Coruscant and the Core Worlds, a 2002 reference book published by Wizards of the Coast, but it was not identified until the 2015 Star Wars Roleplaying expansion Strongholds of Resistance, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games. The Chandrila system, and therefore Chandra, was placed in grid square L-9 by The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
